edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal
Class CmtElGamalOnByteArrayReceiver

java.lang.Object
  edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal.CmtElGamalReceiverCore
      edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal.CmtElGamalOnByteArrayReceiver
All Implemented Interfaces:
CmtOnByteArray, CmtReceiver, CommitSecLevel, PerfectlyBindingCmt, SecureCommit, SecurityLevel
public class CmtElGamalOnByteArrayReceiver
extends CmtElGamalReceiverCore
implements CmtReceiver, PerfectlyBindingCmt, CmtOnByteArray

This class implements the receiver side of the ElGamal commitment.

It uses El Gamal encryption for byte arrays, that is, the encryption class used is ScElGamalOnByteArray. This default cannot be changed.

The pseudo code of this protocol can be found in Protocol 3.4 of pseudo codes document at http://crypto.biu.ac.il/scapi/SDK_Pseudocode_SCAPI_V2.0.0.pdf.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

Constructor Detail

CmtElGamalOnByteArrayReceiver

public CmtElGamalOnByteArrayReceiver(Channel channel,
                                     DlogGroup dlog,
                                     KeyDerivationFunction kdf)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                     SecurityLevelException,
                                     InvalidDlogGroupException,
                                     java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                     java.io.IOException,
                                     CheatAttemptException
This constructor lets the caller pass the channel, the dlog group and the KeyDerivation function to work with. The El Gamal option (ScElGamalOnByteArray)is set by default by the constructor and cannot be changed.

Parameters:
channel - used for the communication
dlog - Dlog group
kdf - key derivation function
Throws:
CheatAttemptException - if the receiver suspects the committer trying to cheat.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if there was a problem during serialization.
SecurityLevelException - if the given dlog is not DDH - secure
InvalidDlogGroupException - if the given dlog is not valid
java.io.IOException - if there was a problem during communication
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

Method Detail

verifyDecommitment

public CmtCommitValue verifyDecommitment(CmtCCommitmentMsg commitmentMsg,
                                         CmtCDecommitmentMessage decommitmentMsg)
Proccesses the decommitment phase.

"IF NOT

• u=g^r

• v = h^r * x

• x in G

OUTPUT REJ

ELSE

OUTPUT ACC and value x"

Specified by:
verifyDecommitment in interface CmtReceiver
Parameters:
id - the id of the commitment.
msg - the receiver message from the committer
Returns:
the committed value if the decommit succeeded; null, otherwise.
